wikipedia_page.main: John Souch (1593/4 – 1645) was an English portrait painter. He flourished in the early seventeenth century in the North West of England, and perhaps epitomises the role of art in English local life at that time.

response: * John Souch – Sir Thomas Aston at his Wife's Deathbed
